name: Two Aliens One Box
description:
The title probably already set your expectations but nothing can prepare you for what you're about to see. Two aliens get the box and you won't belive what they did! Download the game to see for yourself!  You are about to experience the UNKNOWN.

Created by:
Katarzyna Kubicz - Art
Kacper Kowalczuk - Programming

Created in 42h during Slavic Game Jam 2017
